description: Killraven (Jonathan Raven) is a fictional freedom fighter in several post-apocalyptic alternate futures of the Marvel Comics universe. He first appeared in Amazing Adventures vol. 2, #18 (May 1973), created by co-plotters Roy Thomas and Neal Adams, scriptwriter Gerry Conway, and penciller Adams. The series featured the first dramatic interracial kiss in American color comic books.
name: Killraven
